title: Exposing a Local Machine Publicly
overview: Understand how and why machines become publicly reachable.

sections.title: Port Forwarding
sections.content:
# Learn

### Port Forwarding

Maps:

```
PublicIP:ExternalPort → PrivateIP:InternalPort
```

Routers block inbound traffic by default for safety.

sections.title: Practice: Port Forwarding (Temporary)
sections.content:
# Practice (Temporary & Controlled)

1. Login to router admin panel
2. Add port forwarding:

   * External port: 8080
   * Internal IP: local IP
   * Internal port: 3000
   * Protocol: TCP
3. Test from mobile data:

```
http://<public-ip>:8080
```

⚠️ Disable after testing.
